title: Teen drug use remains low, but survey finds small rise in heroin and cocaine use
description: A national survey shows teen use of alcohol, nicotine and marijuana remains at record lows. The findings released Wednesday reveal two-thirds of 12th graders reported no use of these substances in the past 30 days. That's a significant drop from...

title: James Millard Carter, 59, of Texas City died Friday, Dec. 19
description: Services for James Millard Carter, 59, of Texas City will be 1 p.m. Tuesday at Hewett-Arney Funeral Home with the Rev. Robert Carter officiating.

title: More thrifting and fewer returns — the early trends that defined shopping this holiday

title: Special drive under way to track drunk driving in Kozhikode city

title: How hurricanes help balance the planet's climate
description: Their violent winds and torrential rains may cause short-term chaos. But they are essential for keeping Earth’s heat and energy system in balance.

title: Miami-Dade Solid Waste Management Ensures New Year’s Day Trash Pickup, Administrative Offices to Close January 1
description: Miami-Dade County announces trash and recycling services will operate on New Year's Day 2026, while administrative offices close.
